channel.title: Bought CS anthology 1 but cant play?
channel.description: Hi, i bought CS anthology 1, in store for 15,- if i install its all ok, untill i wanna play, it directs me to Steam. and there is NO play button only paying button? do i need to buy on steam to?

item.title: Bought CS anthology 1 but cant play?
item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer
item.description:

thx, needed to add activate code:)

item.source: Bought CS anthology 1 but cant play?

item.title: Bought CS anthology 1 but cant play?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Open steam and open ‘Library’. Then look at the bottom left corner, there’s ‘+ Add a game’. Click on that and add it to your steam account.

Read full topic
